price: 125. He will say: "O my Lord! Why have you raised me up blind, while I had sight (before)."
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī aʿmā waqad kuntu baṣīran
